      • setupWeaponItem

        protected org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack setupWeaponItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weaponItem)
        Parameters:
        weaponItem - The base ItemStack for the weapon item.
        Returns:
        The weapon item as set up by gun plugins. If the weapon doesn't exist in either QA or CrackShot, it is given a basic treatment by this plugin.

      • setupMenuItem

        protected org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack setupMenuItem()

        Returns:
        The menu item
